title: 求1.12的匠魂全套.最好一个包
author: jiaowolixia
txt_content: 求个匠魂全套的包 其他不需要 最好有联动

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 凜夜丶雨月 于 2020-4-29 08:01 编辑 

前置地幔https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mantle

匠魂本体https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661201-1-1.html

匠魂护甲https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-786419-1-1.html

刀锻冶匠魂https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-846907-1-1.html
需要拔刀剑https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-726664-1-1.html

ToMeTinkers  https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/tometin

匠魂空岛https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/tinkers-skyblock

寂静宝石: 匠魂支持https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... ts-gems-tic-support
需要寂静宝石  https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/silents-
需要Silent Lib  https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/Silent-Lib

匠魂补充https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/tinkers-complement

魔法匠魂https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/pewter
需要Shadowfacts' Forgelin  https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/shadowfacts-forgelin

匠魂工具升级https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/tinkers-tool-leveling

天境工匠http://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-aether

格雷与匠魂https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/
需要[GTCE]格雷科技社区版https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-818575-1-1.html

工匠接口https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-727609-1-1.html
需要[RFAPI]Redstone Flux API  https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/redstone-flux匠魂扩充https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/plustic
需要[CCL]CodeChickenLib  https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/codechicken-lib-1-8
和版本兼容https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/compatlayer

匠魂拓展https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-addons

[CCM]可合成的创造模式强化头颅https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... blecreativemodifier

[TAIGA]匠魂合金附加https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-670143-1-1.html

匠魂兵工厂扩展https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/armory-expansion
需要前面提到的匠魂护甲

[TITHS]匠魂扩增https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-things
需要前面提到的匠魂护甲

Tinkers Extras  https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkersextras
如有帮助求最佳

replies.author: MC醉梦红尘
replies.txt_content:
[BGM][1.12.X][冒险][内置材质]死神永生/超高难度生存/超越MITE196和贝爷
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1028070-1-1.html
整合里面有匠魂全附属和主附属

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content: 与匠魂联动的mod有37个，匠魂拓展有11个[数据来自mod百科]，加上本体和前置，总共全套50个mod你确定都要？因为有些可能不兼容，你要的话我就帮你组，但有可能冲突打不开

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content:
你准确点要那个，我好组，多了可能会冲突
